definitions: change the address written or printed on (a letter or parcel)

examples.text: the mail is then readdressed and forwarded

shortDefinitions: change address written or printed on

definitions: look at or attend to (an issue or problem) once again

examples.text: an opportunity for the balance of resources between residential care and community care to be readdressed
they have to readdress themselves to the problem of defeating the other teams

shortDefinitions: look at or attend to issue or problem once again
